pref_custom_icon_for_applet.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

pref_custom_label_for_applet.tooltip: Enter custom text to show in the panel.

pref_show_script_name.tooltip: When inside the script there isn't a line assigned to be shown on the applet, the script name will be displayed. With this option disabled, the script name will not be shown on this applet, giving us the possibility to use a custom text for the applet.

pref_overlay_key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu

pref_keep_one_menu_open.description: Keep just one sub menu open
pref_keep_one_menu_open.tooltip: When enabled, the previously opened sub menu will be automatically closed.

pref_update_interval.tooltip: Set the script execution interval. If set to 0 (zero), the timer will be disabled.

pref_update_interval_units.tooltip: Choose the time unit for the script execution interval.

pref_rotation_interval.tooltip: Set the applet text rotation interval. If set to 0 (zero), the timer will be disabled. This timer is only used if there are more than one line asigned to be displayed as the applet text. If there is only one line asigned for the applet text, this timer will be completely ignored. So, it isn't needed to set this timer to 0 (zero) to disable it.

pref_rotation_interval_units.tooltip: Choose the time unit for the applet text rotation interval.

pref_terminal_emulator.tooltip:
Choose the terminal emulator used by this applet.
IMPORTANT!!! The terminal emulator has to support the -e argument.

pref_default_icon_size.tooltip: Set a default size in pixels for the icons inside this applet main menu. The size of the icon of a menu item can be overridden by setting the "iconSize" attribute on the menu item's respective line on the script.

pref_menu_spacing.description: Spacing for items inside the menu

pref_applet_spacing.description: Spacing for items inside the applet
Spacing for items inside the applet
